org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.impurity

Interface ImpurityMeasure<T extends ImpurityMeasure<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of this impurity measure.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<T>, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GiniImpurityMeasure, MSEImpurityMeasure

    public interface ImpurityMeasure<T extends ImpurityMeasure<T>>
extends Comparable<T>, Serializable
    Base interface for impurity measures that can be used in distributed decision tree algorithm.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T add(T measure)
      Adds the given impurity to this.
      default int compareTo(T o)
      double impurity()
      Calculates impurity measure as a single double value.
      T subtract(T measure)
      Subtracts the given impurity for this.

    • Method Detail

      • impurity

        double impurity()
        Calculates impurity measure as a single double value.
        Returns:
        Impurity measure value.

      • add

        T add(T measure)
        Adds the given impurity to this.
        Parameters:
        measure - Another impurity.
        Returns:
        Sum of this and the given impurity.

      • subtract

        T subtract(T measure)
        Subtracts the given impurity for this.
        Parameters:
        measure - Another impurity.
        Returns:
        Difference of this and the given impurity.
